About me

My name is Svetlana

I’m a Front-End Developer located in Montenegro. I moved here from Saint-Petersburg.
I have a strong passion for HTML and CSS, animations and creating intuitive, dynamic user experiences.
I’m well-organised person, problem solver, independent employee with high attention to detail. I’m a fan of WEB-development, my cat Groot, rock-climbing, outdoor activities, amazing series and English lessons. A family person and IT specialist’s wife.
Interested in the entire frontend spectrum and working on ambitious projects with positive people.

WEB-development
Write and read HTML, CSS, JavaScript/TypeScript.
Understand and know preprocessors SASS/SCSS.
Work with libraries - Bootstrap и Grid Layout.
UI/UX Design
Create a delightful user experience through your product’s visual language.
App development
